Html:
Hello!

I found an error in isInRange function at PHPExcel_Cell class.

The function does not correctly determine index of the column, which is tested.

        $myColumn    = PHPExcel_Cell::columnIndexFromString($this->getColumn()) - 1;   (line 464)

        must be replaced to

        $myColumn    = PHPExcel_Cell::columnIndexFromString($this->getColumn());
Thanks, will check on this and fix as necessary
